com.milk.command
Class CommandEvent

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--com.milk.util.BaseEvent

              +--com.milk.command.CommandEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class CommandEvent
extends BaseEvent

This is the class for events having to do with happenings on a Command.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

getCommand

public Command getCommand()
Get the source of this event as a Command. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the source of this event as a Command
